newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Nov crude oil, natural gas output up.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Nov crude oil, natural gas output up.

text.p: China produced 145.23 million tonnes of crude oil in the first 11 months of 1996, a rise of 6.06 percent compared with the same period last year, the State Statistical Bureau said on Thursday.
Oil production in November alone was 13.3364 million tonnes, it said without giving a comparison.
Natural gas output totalled 18.216 billion cubic metres in the first 11 months of the year, up 15.98 percent from the year-earlier period, it said.
Gas production in November alone was 1.719 billion cubic metres. No comparison was given.
